author: miss_bex_boo
title: Great location, nice hotel
text:
The hotel is in a great location, with easy walking access to lots of the main sights of Rome, as well as within easy reach of the Termini station (for transport to/from the airport).
The standard rooms are (very) small, but perfectly functional and very clean, if you're in Rome for sight-seeing rather than spending much time in the room then they are ideal. The shower room was separate to the toilet (no sink in with the toilet), and both were also very small, so would not be suitable for anyone of a larger stature. The rainfall shower lacked pressure, but the handheld shower also attached was much better (for hair washing).
Toiletries provided were a shower gel, a shampoo and body cream. Also provided a hair dryer that worked really well and much more powerful than the usual hotel offerings.
The hotel as a whole was very clean and the staff were lovely! We were super impressed with the receptionist who we saw speak in French, English, Spanish and Italian with great ease.
The breakfast buffet was plentiful and very tasty with a selection of pastries, eggs, bacon, meats, toast, cereals, yogurts, and even vegan and gluten free choices.
